channel.title: Hi, I'm Jordan Sherer from Widefido
channel.description:
Howdy!
I'm Jordan Sherer, founder of [Widefido](http://widefido.com/about/). I have been bootstrapping Widefido on the side since 2007, having created TodoPaper and [MnmlRdr](https://mnmlrdr.com/) during this time. It's been a long road, but this past February I said goodbye to my "real job" and was able to shift to working on Widefido full-time. What an experience!
The Business of Software forums was a primary inspiration and sounding board for me when I was starting my business. The things I learned there helped me immensely along the way. I'm looking forward to seeing where this forum goes and cannot wait to pitch-in and give back.
Props to @ian and @andrey for making this happen.
Best, Jordan

item.title: Hi, I'm Jordan Sherer from Widefido
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Jordan. Welcome to the forums!

Howdy!

I’m Jordan Sherer, founder of Widefido. I have been bootstrapping Widefido on the side since 2007, having created TodoPaper and MnmlRdr during this time. It’s been a long road, but this past February I said goodbye to my “real job” and was able to shift to working on Widefido full-time. What an experience!

The Business of Software forums was a primary inspiration and sounding board for me when I was starting my business. The things I learned there helped me immensely along the way. I’m looking forward to seeing where this forum goes and cannot wait to pitch-in and give back.
